text: Vincent of Saragossa (also known as Vincent Martyr, Vincent of Huesca or Vincent the Deacon), the Protomartyr of Spain, was a deacon of the Church of Saragossa. He is the patron saint of Lisbon and Valencia. His feast day is 22 January in the Roman Catholic Church, Anglican Communion, and the Orthodox Church. Category:People from Aragon Category:3rd-century births Category:Christian saints Category:Lisbon Category:Spanish Roman Catholics
title: Vincent of Saragossa
